full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA DGYES GUR MCHOD PA THUGS RJES BSKUL BA'I DBYAR GYI RNGA SGRA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA DGYES GUR MCHOD PA THUGS RJES BSKUL BA'I DBYAR GYI RNGA SGRA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI SLOB MA DGE TSUL SBYIN PA SHES RAB BSKUL BA'I NGOR SLOB MA 'DI NYID KYI NGOR GRUB CHEN KU KU NA TZA SKYEM SPA'U DNGOS SU PAKshI BADZRA'I MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,)
